content:
Unique Research Fellow (Post-Doc) opportunity @ ESA on the development of innovative Earth Observation (EO) solutions based on Artificial Intelligence (AI) to advance understanding of our planet (http://www.esa.int/eo). You will be based in ESA/ESRIN (Italy) and be part of a dynamic, multi-disciplinary research team at the phi-lab (http://blogs.esa.int/philab/). You will be able to develop your AI research and associated innovative EO applications, alongside a growing team of innovators, data scientists and researchers passionate about innovation.
Apply before 14 Nov 2019 at https://bit.ly/2oCb9h2 (Ref ID 8827)
